topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
Well
It's over now.
That finale was amazing.
I cried a bit, I laughed a bit, I screamed during the final attack, I loved it.
I loved that entire show.
The effects and action scenes were wonderful, I loved the music, but most of all I loved the characters.
Everyone was so freaking likable, and well developed.
Ultraman Mebius is an amazing show, and everyone should watch it.
I'm kind of sad it's over.
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a
